      Classes in edu.packt.neuralnet.math that implement IActivationFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HyperTan
      This class represents the Hyperbolic Tangent Activation Function implementing the interface IActivationFunction
      class  Linear
      This class represents the pure linear activation function, implementing the interface IActivationFunction
      class  Sigmoid
      This class represents the sigmoid activation function, implementing the interface IActivationFunction
      class  Step
      This class implements the interface IActivationFunction to represent the Hardlimiting Threshold or Step function
